remarks: An isomorphism in the category of non-unital rings is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 28-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
rngcsectOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcsectOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcsectOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcsectOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngcsectOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
rngcisoOLD.n $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
rngcisoOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X I Y ) <-> F e. ( X RngIsom Y ) ) ) $.
